mapper.select: SELECT A.PRO_CODE, A.PRO_PRICE, A.PRO_TYPE, A.PRO_DATE, A.SELLER_NAME, A.PRO_WEIGHT, A.PRO_REGDATE, A.PRO_QUANTITY, B.FILE_NAME, B.FILE_NO FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT FILE_NO, FILE_NAME, PRO_CODE, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY PRO_CODE ORDER BY FILE_NO ASC) AS RANKING FROM TBL_FILE ) T WHERE RANKING = 1 ) B ON A.PRO_CODE = B.PRO_CODE ORDER BY PRO_CODE DESC
SELECT * FROM TBL_PRODUCT WHERE PRO_DELFLAG = 'Y' AND PRO_CODE = #{pro_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT (PRO_CODE, PRO_PRICE, PRO_TYPE, PRO_DATE, SELLER_NAME, PRO_WEIGHT, PRO_QUANTITY) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL, #{pro_price}, #{pro_type}, #{pro_date}, #{seller_name}, #{pro_weight}, #{pro_quantity})
INSERT INTO TBL_FILE (FILE_NO, PRO_CODE, FILE_NAME, FILE_ORI_NAME, FILE_URL) VALUES (SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, SEQ_PRODUCT.CURRVAL, #{file_name}, #{file_oriname}, #{file_url})
